data.title: Regent University
data.meta_description: bring your group to FUge Find Other Camps At Regent University
data.text:
Founded in 1977, Regent University’s 13,000 students are studying on its 70-acre campus in Virginia Beach, VA., and online around the world. The university offers associate, bachelor’s, master’s, and doctoral degrees from a Christian perspective in 150+ areas of study including business, communication and the arts, cybersecurity and technology, divinity, education, government, law, leadership, nursing and healthcare, and psychology. 2024 will be the first year that Regent University hosts FUGE Camps! Both Centrifuge and MFuge will be offered.

Amenities

Regent offers a campus complete with state-of-the-art meeting facilities and a range of impressive amenities. Daily worship takes place in the 710-seat proscenium arch theater, and the Student Center houses a cafe, gift shop, and game room, making it the perfect place to relax and recharge.

Accommodations at Regent are a highlight, with fully furnished apartment-style living featuring versatile floor plans ranging from studios to four-bedroom suites. Each room comes complete with a full-size kitchen, cable TV, and wireless internet, providing all the comforts of home.

Outdoor activity spaces are plentiful at Regent, including athletic fields, sand volleyball, fire-pits, and plenty of outdoor seating. And when it’s time to refuel, there are catering and cafeteria-style dining options available, as well as a daily rotation of food trucks serving up a variety of options.

It’s important to note that any damages to facilities, including the dorm rooms, are the responsibility of the group occupying them, and lost keys result in additional charges.

*Information listed above is subject to change without notice.

Tracks

Basketball, Battleball, Crafts, Creative Journaling, Creative Movement, Creative Painting, Defending Your Faith, Disc Golf, Drama, For Girls Only, Gagaball, Games Track, Growing Your Faith, Guitar, Hiking, Kickball, Lawn Games, Leadership 101, Life After High School, Percussion, Random Acts of Service, Sharing Your Faith, Sign Language, Soccer, Spiritual Gifts, STEM Track, The Man Track, Total Body Fitness, Ultimate Frisbee, Volleyball, Water Games, Worship Leadership. *Track times offered are subject to change and depend on the size of camp for the session attending.

ministry tracks (Mfuge)

Childrens, Games and Rec, PCY (Painting, Construction, and Yardwork), Social. *Track times offered are subject to change and depend on the size of camp for the session attending.

Camp Pastor

Jared Richard

Jared Richard is the lead pastor of Bay Leaf Baptist Church in Raleigh, NC, where he lives with his wife Jordan and their two children: Jude and Julia. He obtained a Ph.D. from Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary and an M.Div. from New Orleans Baptist Theological Seminary. He is also a proud graduate of Louisiana State University. He has been serving with FUGE Camps in various roles since 2005, serving as a camp pastor since 2009. Jared has a passion for proclaiming God’s Word to God’s people and is excited to be able to share the ministry of the Word through preaching at camp once again. For more information about Jared or to listen to some of his sermons, please visit www.bayleaf.org

Worship Leader

Austin Miller Band

Austin Miller Band is a group based out of the Carolinas that formed in 2018. Known for their high energy, and passion, AMB constantly seeks to point others to Christ through their music and lives. Seeking to tear down the divide that seems to have been made between the stage and the seats, AMB can be found in every aspect of camp. Austin Miller Band has had the opportunity to partner with Lifeway to lead worship for FUGE Camps both as a full summer band and now as contract musicians. They have also had the opportunity to play for many events from kids camps, to DNOWs, to college retreats, and much more. Front man, Austin Miller, serves as Worship Director at Hope Community Church in Shelby, NC. He understands the importance of youth ministry and desires to see students experience the freedom that comes in Christ. Be on the lookout for music from AMB that serves the Church and that reaches those far from God that they may experience Hope in God. To contact AMB, follow @austinmillerband on Instagram and Facebook.
